price: Zar kad poumiremo i kad kosti i zemlja postanemo, zar ćemo mi, zaista, biti oživljeni,
arabic: أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗا وَعِظَٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبۡعُوثُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: a-idhā mit'nā wakunnā turāban waʿiẓāman a-innā lamabʿūthūna
